abstract: Mohammadreza Jalaeipour, former Iranian political prisoner, coordinates social media campaign with other Iranian activists to convince Americans to approve Iran nuclear agreement; endeavor aids those encouraging Congress to okay pact and counters media messages condemning deal organized by American pro-Israel organization, Nuclear Free Iran.
lead_paragraph: The messages of support from Iranian human rights activists are a new element in the emotional campaigns for and against the deal in the United States.

headline.main: On YouTube, Iran Activists Urge America to Back Nuclear Deal
headline.print_headline: On YouTube, Iran Activists Urge America to Back Deal

snippet: The messages of support from Iranian human rights activists are a new element in the emotional campaigns for and against the deal in the United States.
